var.name: value
var.string: Once you insert another sequence, you cannot Cancel this action – your old sequence is automatically saved with the new sequence inserted. To go back to your old sequence, you will need to delete all new sequence activities by hand, and then save. To leave your current sequence unchanged, click Cancel. Otherwise click OK to select a sequence to insert.
